Leiston Mobile Library Route 11

Contact us:

Manager: Rob Alcraft and Peter Fiske

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Telephone: 01473 351249

Route timetable

Stop Village Location Time
11A Worlingham Pharmacy 1000 – 1020
11B Mutford Lindenette 1030 – 1045
11C Mutford Old Post Office 1050 – 1105
11D Mutford Village Hall 1110 – 1125
11E Carlton Colville Chestnut Crescent 1140 – 1200
11F Carlton Colville Rounces Lane 1205 – 1225
11G Pakefield Apple Tree Close 1330 – 1415
11H Pakefield Arbor Lane 1425 – 1515
11I Gisleham Solar Farm 1520 – 1540

Calling every 4 weeks on Thursdays:

2020: 23 January, 20 February, 19 March, 15 April, 14 May, 11 June, 9 July, 6 August, 3 September, 1 October, 29 October, 26 November, no visit in December
